document.full_text: tornado weather threatens an area from dallas, texas to memphis, tennessee on monday at the start of what could be a miserable three days for the south and the ohio valley, forecasters said.
document.title: tornado threat extends from dallas to memphis
lines_and_colors: tornado weather threatens an area from dallas, texas to memphis, tennessee on monday at the start of what could be a miserable three days for the south and the ohio valley, forecasters said.
